The asteroid hit the spaceship while I was outside, fixing a broken solar panel. The cable broke. I am alone. I hope everybody is okay.

# BITSY VERSION 3.4

! ROOM_FORMAT 1

DLG a
The cable that linked me to the spaceship. I must follow it.

DLG c
A burned wall.

DLG d
A scrap of metal.

DLG e
A broken door.

DLG b
Cara. Dead. Her helmet is broken.

DLG g
Alex. Dead.

DLG h
